text: Nayi, e siga mangan fɛma, e yi mangana tɔnna fe fala a xa, e naxa, “I mi yi tɔnna nde yisarin naxan a fala a xii tonge saxanna bun ma, muxu yo a xui ramini ala gbɛtɛ ma a xandideni hanma muxu gbɛtɛ ba i tan na, mangana, na wolima yatane yinla ra nɛn?” Mangan yi e yabi, a naxa, “Ɲɔndin nan a feen na, fata Mede kaane nun Perise kaane gbee sariyan na naxan mi maxɛtɛ.”
